hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah that:whenever the Prophet (saas) went to his bed, he would put his hand - meaning his right hand - beneath his cheek then say: "Allahumma qini 'adhabaka yawm tab'athu - [or: tajma'u] - 'ibadaka (O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day when You resurrect - or gather - Your slaves)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَدْعُو بِهِ إِذَا أَوَى إِلَى فِرَاشِهِ
chapter.eng-name: : What One Should Say When Going To Bed
